name: Don't Fear the Dark
description:
You get left alone at home, and feel something around you... lurking... 

You feel lightheaded and you get your phone out to try and see around you, and see the despicable truth, you fear the dark, you need to keep your battery life up and survive

Monsters, or so you think, are coming for you and  your sanity is at risk! Keep you sanity up by fighting back your monsters and lighting up the room around you... Remember, your phone's battery is the only way to stay sane.

There is only one objetive... SURVIVE

Ţ̴̭͓͍͉̻̻̜̩̲̙͉̪̐̈́̎̕ͅͅh̶̻̅̃̊̆̒̀͠é̶̢̺̝̭͍̻͕̯̬̜͍̳̟͊͐̃̂̾́̈͜͝ͅy̸̨̳͍̜̠̠̪͇͆͗̃̔ ̸̟͂̾a̴̧̨̩̤̤̦͇̼̳͚̭̪̹̣̽ř̶̨͇̹̱̘͓̣̘̠̗̳̤̤̘́͐͊̆̌̋̋̒̽̔ē̸͇̬̹͆͑͊̈́̓̊͐͒͊ ̴̟̰̜̯͉̜̟̝̄̉̽̓̕͝w̸̡̺̒̈́́́̒̓͌̏͒̓̽͆͝ä̵͕́̍̿͛̐̂̽̕͝͝t̷̡̡̰̤͎͍͈̰͇͕͕̃̋̽̈́̄͘c̵̥͓͓̳̳̹͍̮̳͕͂͗̈̐̽̆͛̍̑͒́͘͜h̴̩̩̎͋̿̅̓̿ì̵̡̞̳͑̇̈́͘n̶̡̥̰̳̟̬̳̂g̴̡̛̬̺̜̼̝̒͒̅́̔̽̕͝͠
